title: Minecraft:breathable 1.8.0
description: Defines what blocks this entity can breathe in and gives them the ability to suffocate.

totalSupply.description: Time in seconds the entity can hold its breath

total_supply.description: Time in seconds the entity can hold its breath

suffocateTime.description: Time in seconds between suffocation damage

suffocate_time.description: Time in seconds between suffocation damage

inhaleTime.description: Time in seconds to recover breath to maximum

inhale_time.description: Time in seconds to recover breath to maximum

breathesAir.description: If true, this entity can breathe in air

breathes_air.description: If true, this entity can breathe in air

breathesWater.description: If true, this entity can breathe in water

breathes_water.description: If true, this entity can breathe in water

breathesLava.description: If true, this entity can breathe in lava

breathes_lava.description: If true, this entity can breathe in lava

breathesSolids.description: If true, this entity can breathe in solid blocks

breathes_solids.description: If true, this entity can breathe in solid blocks

generatesBubbles.description: If true, this entity will have visible bubbles while in water

generates_bubbles.description: If true, this entity will have visible bubbles while in water

breatheBlocks.description: List of blocks this entity can breathe in, in addition to the above

breathe_blocks.description: List of blocks this entity can breathe in, in addition to the above

nonBreatheBlocks.description: List of blocks this entity can't breathe in, in addition to the above

non_breathe_blocks.description: List of blocks this entity can't breathe in, in addition to the above
